column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: time. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix time: <http://www.ontology.com/time#> .time:Time a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time" ;    rdfs:comment "A specific point in the continuum of existence" .time:Instant a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf time:Time ;    rdfs:label "Instant" ;    rdfs:comment "A particular moment in time" .time:Interval a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf time:Time ;    rdfs:label "Interval" ;    rdfs:comment "A span of time, with a start and end point" .time:before a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Time ;    rdfs:range time:Time ;    rdfs:label "is before" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies if a point or interval of time is before another" .time:after a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Time ;    rdfs:range time:Time ;    rdfs:label "is after" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies if a point or interval of time is after another" .time:isPartOf a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Time ;    rdfs:range time:Time ;    rdfs:label "is part of" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies if a point or interval of time is part of another interval" .time:hasDateTime a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;    rdfs:label "has date/time" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies the date and time of a particular point or interval in time" .time:hasBeginning a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Interval ;    rdfs:range time:Instant ;    rdfs:label "has beginning" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies the beginning of an interval" .time:hasEnd a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Interval ;    rdfs:range time:Instant ;    rdfs:label "has end" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies the end of an interval" .

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: time. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix time: <http://www.ontology.com/time#> .time:Time a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time" ;    rdfs:comment "A specific point in the continuum of existence" .time:Instant a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf time:Time ;    rdfs:label "Instant" ;    rdfs:comment "A particular moment in time" .time:Interval a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf time:Time ;    rdfs:label "Interval" ;    rdfs:comment "A span of time, with a start and end point" .time:before a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Time ;    rdfs:range time:Time ;    rdfs:label "is before" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies if a point or interval of time is before another" .time:after a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Time ;    rdfs:range time:Time ;    rdfs:label "is after" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies if a point or interval of time is after another" .time:isPartOf a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Time ;    rdfs:range time:Time ;    rdfs:label "is part of" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies if a point or interval of time is part of another interval" .time:hasDateTime a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;    rdfs:label "has date/time" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies the date and time of a particular point or interval in time" .time:hasBeginning a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Interval ;    rdfs:range time:Instant ;    rdfs:label "has beginning" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies the beginning of an interval" .time:hasEnd a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain time:Interval ;    rdfs:range time:Instant ;    rdfs:label "has end" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies the end of an interval" .
